name: Pop ‘em!
description:
Pop 'em!

EXCLUSIVE AND ONLY AVAILABLE FOR THE Apple Watch!

Pop 'em! is an addictive little puzzle game. You have to Pop the balloons in the
correct sequence and as fast as you can to try and achieve a great score and reach the top of the Leaderboard! This addictive little game is exclusive to Apple Watch.

Bring some fun gaming to your wrist and enjoy this puzzle game and see if you can
get a great score and beat your friends!

Can you get to the top of the Leaderboard and be the best Popper? Download Pop 'em! and give it a play. You can even play a game while you are in the bath as the Apple Watch is waterproof!

No annoying ads to ruin your gameplay experience!

** Apple Watch ONLY **

www.jimmy-mole.com
